titleStmt.title: An admonition to all such as shall intend heereafter [sic] to enter the state of matrimonie godly, and agreeably to lawes. First, that they contract not with such persons as be hereafter expressed ...
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1559-1575 : Parker)
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
